definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: He was deeply revered for his ability and sagacity in military affairs.
sentences.chinese: 他在軍事上的才略深受大家敬仰。

sentences.english: The credit freeze is only now showing signs of thawing.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，信貸凍結才略顯解凍的跡象。

sentences.english: Only by following all his directives will the lives of millions be spared…
sentences.chinese: 只有遵從他的指示行事才略保全數百萬的無辜生命。

sentences.english: Ccan be and diligence bring luck.
sentences.chinese: 仔細和勤奮才略抓住機遇。

definition: to strive/to make an effort/to exert oneself
half the day/a long time/quite a while
to compose oneself/to concentrate one's attention
to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind
the hero has plans already laid (idiom); to have plans ready in advance/forewarned is forearmed
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
